column4: Anyone have any idea about the images Brasero creates? This is weird and annoying

I personally find brasero and k3b to be lacking in trusting my burns to them for fear of data loss. I bought Nero Linux 4 its great. BTW file roller can open iso files for extraction if thats what you need.
I know, I hate Brasero, but I had to make some disc images earlier and I had no proper image tools and no Internet connection to get them
